scripts.build:esm: tsc --project tsconfig.build.json --module ESNext --outDir esm && find esm -name '*.js' -exec bash -c 'mv "$0" "${0%.js}.mjs"' {} \;
scripts.build:cjs: tsc --project tsconfig.build.json --module CommonJS --outDir cjs && find cjs -name '*.js' -exec bash -c 'mv "$0" "${0%.js}.cjs"' {} \;
scripts.build: yarn build:types && yarn build:esm && yarn build:cjs
